tit.e: Nagasa no kuni no miyatsuko (regional governor in ancient Japan)
tit.cmt: (government post) government postには違いないと思いますが、これだと中央官僚のようにも聞こえるので、regional governor in ancient Japan（古代日本の地域の統括者）としました。
tit.e: Nagasa no kuni no miyatsuko (regional governor in ancient Japan)

sen.j: 長狭国造（ながさのくにのみやつこ・ながさこくぞう)は安房国東部を支配した国造。
sen.e: Nagasnokuninomiyatsuko (also known as Nagasakokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko ruled the east part of Awa Province.
Nagas no kuni no miyatsuko (also known as Nagasa kokuzo) was a kuni no miyatsuko that ruled the east part of Awa Province in ancient Japan.
Nagas no kuni no miyatsuko (also known as Nagasa kokuzo) was a kuni no miyatsuko that ruled the east part of Awa Province in ancient Japan.
Kamuyaimiminomikoto
Kamuyaimimi no mikoto
Kamuyaimimi no mikoto

sen.j: 神武天皇の皇子で、綏靖天皇の兄。
sen.e: He was a Prince of Emperor Jinmu and an older brother of Emperor Suizei.
He was a Prince of Emperor Jinmu and an older brother of Emperor Suizei.
He was a Prince of Emperor Jinmu and an older brother of Emperor Suizei.

sen.j: 弟に皇位を譲り、神祇の奉祭者となった。
sen.e: He handed over the right of succession to the throne to his younger brother, and became a worshipper of Shinto deities.
He handed over the right of succession to the throne to his younger brother, and became a worshipper of Shinto deities.
He handed over the right of succession to the throne to his younger brother, and became a worshipper of Shinto deities.

sen.j: 闘鶏国造・仲国造などと同系。
sen.e: The clan was descended from the same line as Tsugenokuninomiyatsuko, Nakanokuninomiyatsuko, and the like.
The clan is classied in the same family line that includes Tsugenokuni no miyatsuko and Nakano kuni no miyatsuko.
The clan is classied in the same family line that includes Tsugenokuni no miyatsuko and Nakano kuni no miyatsuko.
It was possibly the Nagasa clan.
It was possibly the Nagasa clan.
It was possibly the Nagasa clan.
Kabane was supposedly Atai.
Kabane was, possibly, Aatai.
Kabane was, possibly, Aatai.
Nagasa Gun, Awa Province.
Nagasa Gun, Awa Province.
Nagasa Gun, Awa Province.

sen.j: 現在の千葉県鴨川市の大半。
sen.e: The most part of the present Kamogawa City, Chiba Prefecture.
The most part of the present Kamogawa City, Chiba Prefecture.
The most part of the present Kamogawa City, Chiba Prefecture.
Unknown.
Unknown.
Unknown.

sen.j: 安房国造と伊甚国造の勢力に圧迫されて没落したという説がある。
sen.e: There is an opinion that the clan fell under the pressure of Awanokuninomiyatsuko and Ijimunokuninomiyatsuko.
There is an opinion that the clan fell under the pressures from Awa no kuni no miyatsuko and Ijimu no kuni no miyatsuko.
There is an opinion that the clan fell under the pressures from Awa no kuni no miyatsuko and Ijimu no kuni no miyatsuko.
